headline: The 12 Best Stocks of 2025, Plus 3 That Could Run Into Trouble
summary: FEATURE  Investors have a love/hate relationship with winning stocks. While everyone wants a winner, the bigger the gain, the more the anxiety about what comes next. Barron’s took a look at the year’s hottest stocks to see if investors should be worried.

raw.headline: The 12 Best Stocks of 2025, Plus 3 That Could Run Into Trouble

headline: How Western Digital’s AI-Linked ESOP Shelf Offering At Western Digital (WDC) Has Changed Its Investment Story
summary: In late November 2025, Western Digital filed a shelf registration for about US$1.11 billion in common stock tied to an ESOP-related offering, while also highlighting strong AI-driven demand supported by long-term purchase orders from major customers. Analysts now point to Western Digital’s deep relationships with top cloud providers and AI workloads as a key driver of its longer-term storage demand visibility. Next, we’ll examine how Western Digital’s AI-fueled customer commitments may...

headline: This ‘Strong Buy’ AI Stock Could Jump 56% —Time to Buy?
summary: This “Strong Buy” AI stock is trading cheap and poised to deliver strong earnings growth over the next couple of years.
